name: Tales from Space: About a Blob
name_original: Tales from Space: About a Blob
description:
Tales from Space: About a Blob is a side-scrolling puzzle-platformer about a race of insatiable alien Blobs. Looking for their next meal, the blobs end up on a distant Earth-like planet that didn’t invite them for dinner!

Key Features:
- Grow to massive proportions. Eat savory humans, farm animals and everything else!
- Delicious local co-op support. Join in the feast at any time.
- Tasty Puzzles: Low in fat and high in fun.
- Appetizing, retro-inspired art style.
- Plenty of salty humor peppered throughout the world.
- Exquisite Blob abilities. Use the powers of magnetism and electricity to find your next meal.
- Lip-smacking Trophies and Home Rewards.
- Leaderboards to track your most delectable speed runs.

Download the Game today!

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online features require an account and are subject to terms of service and applicable privacy policy (playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service & playstationnetwork.com/privacy-policy). One time license fee entitles play on up to 2 PlayStation® 3 systems activated by this account.
